Data Fields
CSIRX_StreamFccCtrl_s Struct Reference
IP » CSIRX CSL-FL » DataStructure Dynamic Data Structures

#include <csirx_structs_if.h>

Data Fields

uint16_t frameCounter
 
uint8_t fccVc
 
uint8_t fccEn
 

Detailed Description

Stream Frame Capture Counter control. Used to enable / disable the FCC and specify which virtual channel it should operate on.

Field Documentation

uint8_t CSIRX_StreamFccCtrl_s::fccEn

Frame Capture Counter enable.

uint8_t CSIRX_StreamFccCtrl_s::fccVc

Indicates which VC should be used to generate FCC interrupts. This value must not change while FccEn is enabled

uint16_t CSIRX_StreamFccCtrl_s::frameCounter

Current Frame number being processed
